concept.title: Updating Sametime data in MongoDB
concept.shortdesc: When you update existing contact information in the directory, you must run the Sametime database utility in order to synchronize the information with that of the Community Server databases.

conbody.note:
You do not need to run the Sametime database utility when adding new users or groups to the Domino or LDAP directory.
The Sametime database utility uses a comma-separated value list that you compile to change names, delete names, or convert all names from Domino to Domino LDAP formatted names.
When you create a CSV file, include the descriptor that corresponds to the task you are running. CSV files are case-sensitive and sensitive to spaces. You can create multiple CSV files, but each CSV file can include only one descriptor and can complete only one task.The ID task allows case-insensitive comparisons of user IDs by adding NC_ID_TASK_CASE_INSENSITIVE=1 to the sametime.ini file. For more information, refer to .

row.entry: Changes specified first names, last names, display names, or group names.

Changes all contact list information from Domino Directory format to LDAP format. For example, a user listed as CN=Maria Smith/OU=Sales/O=HCL changes to CN=Maria Smith,OU=Sales,O=HCL. This task can be performed only once because you can only convert the directory format one time.

entry.p: Removes specified individual contact names from contact lists and privacy lists.
